credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: Poster Design:  Abstract Bird on Blue Ground, study for poster, "Quickest Way by Airmail"
medium: Pen and brush and black ink, brush and white gouache, graphite on heavy white wove paper
description: An abstract rendering of bird, the body in solid black with white circular eye, resting on the tip of a small, elongated triangle deliniated in heavy black line   in upper right corner.  A white diagonal line connects the two triangular wings across the central black body.  The beak is indicated by a small white triangle which touches the left margin.
name: Drawing
